isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 3.5: CIRCUIT FUNCTION AND DIAGNOSTICS - CRUISE CONTROL, PTO, HAND THROTTLE SYSTEM - REMOTE PRESET PTO MODE DOES NOT OPERATE PROPERLY

svcproc.title: REMOTE PRESET PTO MODE DOES NOT OPERATE PROPERLY
svcproc.para: Turning the cruise control on using the cab Cruise ON/OFF switch, then turning the remote Enable Preset switch ON will cause the PTO to operate at the customer selected preset rpm. The ECM does not diagnose the Enable Preset switch circuit, therefore there are no fault codes to indicate the circuit is defective.

If the vehicle cruise control works properly, but the remote Enable Preset switch does not work, perform Testing Remote PTO Preset And Variable Enable Circuits ( Figure 3.152 and 3.153
).
